jetpack-related-posts.title: Dudu Cavern
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Book Now Journey east along the coastal plains to the fresh water system of Dudu Cavern. The cavern are set in an area of great natural beauty where you can swim in the crystal clear lakes that are the entrance to a cave system . An all day trip from…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Try Scuba
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: PADI DISCOVER SCUBA DIVING Our Discover Scuba Diving course is the perfect introduction to the underwater world!!! First we go to the pool for some basic diving skills, and then we head out to the ocean for a dive on one of our gorgeous reefs.A PADI instructor will be right…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Paradise Island
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you’re looking for something special, look no further. This all day trip includes 3 meals, private transportation to Paradise Island (known locally as Cayo Arena), and guided snorkeling around one of the Dominican Republic’s most beautiful reefs. The day starts early at 7.30, where we meet and begin our journey to…
